attributes.action: The police should provide at least 1/2 of the service that each borough pays
attributes.additional_details: My Borough receives 20 pence of policing for every pound that we’re charged, we don’t have a single active police station.
attributes.background: Insist that at least half of the money that the police charge is spent in the Bourough that is collected from

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about policing in London are a matter for the Metropolitan Police, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The London Assembly, which oversess the Mayor's Office for Policing and Crime, has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
